projects.title: Semantic Studies and Research Laboratory
projects.description: Liderado pelo professor Wellington Gomes de Medeiros, PhD, este grupo de pesquisa objetiva investigar processos interativos em design identificados como processos dinâmicos observados durante a interação de usuários com produtos e contextos de uso, incluindo a semântica do produto, fatores humanos, e as dimensões pragmática e emocional da interação em design, em uma abordagem interdisciplinar. Os estudos exploram a idéia de Interação Significante (IS) para identificar e analisar os atributos e as qualidades de produtos, contextos de uso, e dos próprios usuários durante processos interativos em um ambiente dialógico entre esses três elementos. A IS objetiva: (1) classificar os significados claramente identificáveis e aqueles menos evidentes que emergem durante interações; (2) identificar significados simbólicos (agregados por convenção) e não-simbólicos (inerentes aos produtos); (3) caracterizar as dimensões pragmática e emocional de interações de usuários com produtos; (4) determinar valores conectados às duas dimensões: prática e crítica (pragmática), ideológica e lúdica (emocional). Esses valores são propostos como uma estrutura dinâmica para a identificação, classificação e análise das qualidades semânticas de produtos, contextos e usuários durante interações, procurando identificar as dimensões pragmática e emocional da interação de usuários com determinado produto. A IS é, portanto, um modelo proposto para a análise sistemática de produtos em uso e da observação do comportamento de usuários durante interações, quando expressam livres associações que podem identificar e qualificar os produtos do ponto de vista do usuário. Os estudos utilizam combinação de métodos qualitativos e quantitativos, incluindo video-observação, questionários e entrevistas. O objetivo final da é identificar aspectos relevantes em processos de interação em design que possam ser utilizados na criação de produtos mais adequados às expectativas pragmáticas e emocionais dos usuários.

profile_positions.description:
With a background that combines (industrial) product design, IT product management, permaculture, design thinking and systems practice, I will dedicate my technical, social and business skills into our collaboration to map, improve and develop the circularity and regenerative potential of your organization. These skills include: data analysis, user research, facilitation, training, storytelling, stakeholder management, product discovery, user journey-mapping and service design.
I map the existing value chains, metrics and goals, and propose regenerative business models, engaging communities promoting local (bio)diversity and resilience, so that the ecosystem is better because of your business, not despite of it.
I can create the business model with you, defining metrics, goals a strategy and a roadmap. I will work with local legislation and regulations, to help you guarantee that you are operating within the best standards for your organization and biorregion.
profile_positions.title: Service Designer

profile_positions.description: Product Manager for Conservation Connect platform, forcused on preserving biodiversity by funding conservation initiatives globally, and connecting these projects and other funders to each other. See: conservationconnect.earth

profile_positions.description: Our collaboration started with a submission to the No Waste Challenge, from What Design Can Do. We are currently nominated (within 85 out of 1409 applicants): It includes a Zero Waste Map of Amsterdam, and other educational initiatives, such as the Zero Waste Bike tours. I am currently a contractor for WeGoZero, providing consultancy on Circular Economy.
profile_positions.title: Zero Waste and Circular Economy Consultant

profile_positions.description: Project manager: coordinated projects across different departments, mostly with Content and Translation teams. Technical Product Specialist for the Tiqets Booking Engine: I was the direct point of content with B2B partners, establishing a liaison between the Product Development team and the Sales teams; I conducted User Research, such as interviews; and created new functionalities and features. The cycle was: gathering the partners' feedback to the Product team, then I tested and documented the product, then trained the Sales team on the new product developments. I also personally implemented the Booking Engine for several partners' websites, using CMS such as WordPress, Squarespace, Joomla. Other activities included: implementing the UX of the Booking Engine promotional website (Wordpress).
profile_positions.title: Jr. Project Manager and Product Specialist

profile_positions.description:
- Guiding and Coaching the team on how to use Agile frameworks and practices (e.g. Scrum) to build more autonomous, self-organized, and efficient teams.
- Facilitating team sessions and applying agile methods that enable teams to work efficiently.
- Facilitating discussion, decision making, and conflict resolution as a servant leader
- Supporting and educating the Product Owner, especially with respect to refining and managing the product backlog.
- Managing, planning, and executing iterations (e.g. sprints). Overseeing all relevant team artifacts as backlog, burn-down charts, etc.
- Monitoring the product variables (story points, scope cost, effort, etc.) and KPIs against the product vision and strongly serving and supporting the team in their quest to achieve great results
- Acting as a servant leader to remove impediments or guiding the team to do so autonomously too.
- Assisting with internal and external communication, improving transparency, and radiating information
- Ensuring compliance requirements are fulfilled.
- Contributing to the end-to-end processes, by providing regular forecasts and reports.
- Representing the team towards the Product Owner and other relevant stakeholders.
profile_positions.title: Trainee Project Manager Agile Global IT eCom

- Worked on large sets of data and content, verifying and preparing it together with the Content Moderation department, coordinated with the Machine-Learning systems project.
- Analysed and categorized datasets,  writing reports and presenting them in visual and actionable formats, to improve decision making of different product tracks at Booking

volunteer_experiences.role: Product Designer in Clay Cross Food Bank

volunteer_experiences.description: Worked as a cook with the cooking club from Pluk!, a Community-Supported Agriculture initiative in Amsterdam West. We cooked voluntarily once a month, with zero food waste. We hosted benefit events, such as brunches and dinners, and offered the food on a donation-basis. During these occasions, we would educate people on matters such as the environmental and social aspects of organic, fair-trade, smal-scale permaculture farms, using agri-forest systems, and the whole chain involved in producing food and handling waste (composting, for example). The proceeds (after costs) of these events were donated to a social cause of the cooking club's choice, such as poverty and crisis mitigation, aiming to help socially-impacted minorities like refugees.

Providing guidance to people who want to move towards veganism.

---

Do you want to go vegetarian or vegan but need help making the transition? Are you already vegan and want some one-on-one support? Well, you’re in the right place!

Get connected via email with a volunteer mentor who’ll help you with anything from navigating the grocery store aisles to figuring out how to respond when people ask you questions. The Vegan Mentor Program now has 1,600 mentors in 950 cities in 50 countries. Over 5,500 mentees have been matched so far!

company.name: Movimento dos Trabalhadores do Campo - MTC Brasil

volunteer_experiences.description:
Somos mais de 5 mil famílias camponesas organizadas nos grupos de base do MTC em 11 estados do Brasil. Pautamos a luta contra o agronegócio e defendemos a agricultura camponesa como modelo de produção justa e sustentável. Com os povos do campo, regenerando a terra, as águas, a floresta.
Vivenciamos um cenário de ataques, perda de direitos básicos. 19 milhões de brasileiros estão em situação de insegurança alimentar grave.

Ajude o MTC a garantir alimento e dignidade aos povos do campo.
Doe para o Fundo Emergencial do MTC, para continuarmos esse trabalho de transformar vidas!

“Não existe combate à fome sem ajuda ao pequeno agricultor familiar. É por ele que vamos conseguir combater a desnutrição”. – Daniel Balaban, diretor do Programa Mundial de Alimentos da ONU.

https://mtcbrasil.org.br/campaigns/fundo-emergencial-de-solidariedade-ao-mtc/

Amstergaard Foundation believes that greenery contributes to a beautiful and healthy city. Our starting point: transforming the strip on De Ruijterkade into a beautiful, fertile garden where residents and companies can meet. We entered into discussions with the municipality and the neighborhood.

In the meeting for residents and companies, our mission 'for and by the neighborhood' was received with enthusiasm. The circular aspect was decisive for the municipality. We got the green light and with the use of subsidies: 'Green in the neighborhood' and 'Project preparation for sustainable initiatives' we were able to start our project. On 10/10/2018 the time had come, on the day of sustainability our first 2 mini food forests landed on De Ruijterkade- and the Ruijtergaard became a fact!
Our mission: a bead necklace from orchards throughout the city.

https://amstergaard.nl/gaarden/ruijtergaard/
